resources.string: In case the button does not automatically change in the waiting line. Scan the black/white code at the start of the waiting line of the attraction.

No longer getting bored in the queue for an attraction, that\'s why you use this app. When you join a queue, a game or a puzzle is released. You can navigate to it by pressing the Go button. It is also possible to navigate to the game or puzzle by going to the QR function. Scan with the camera the QR code, which hangs at the start of each queue. Have Fun!
